posts.post_content:
Hi,

Looking to buy a low grade (PSA/SGC 2-3) T206 Cobb.  I have had numerous successful transactions here, though I don’t post often.

I should add that I have seen the items available for sale on eBay.

Thanks!

posts.post_title: which one are you looking for?
posts.post_content: Green, Bat on, Bat off, or Red
